reporter_caption.center: TAYLOR v. SCHOOL BOARD OF BREVARD COUNTY, SC01-1924 (Fla. 11-16-2004)

caption.center: LAWRENCE TAYLOR, ET AL., Petitioner(s), v. SCHOOL BOARD OF BREVARD COUNTY,

opinion.opinion_text:
Petitioners' Motion for Clarification and Alternative Motion for Re-Hearing is hereby denied.
WELLS, ANSTEAD, QUINCE and CANTERO, JJ., concur.
PARIENTE, C.J., and LEWIS, J., dissent.
